name: Smyth, Appellant, v. Fidelity and Deposit Co. of Maryland
name_abbreviation: Smyth v. Fidelity & Deposit Co. of Maryland

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Smyth, Appellant, v. Fidelity and Deposit Co. of Maryland.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Cunningham, J., reported in 125 Pa, Superior Ct, 597,
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William A. Schnader, of Schnader & Lewis, with him Louis F. Floge, for appellant.
Francis F. Burch, with him George O. Philips, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Smyth, Appellant, v. Fidelity and Deposit Co. of Maryland.
Argued May 24,1937.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
William A. Schnader, of Schnader & Lewis, with him Louis F. Floge, for appellant.
Francis F. Burch, with him George O. Philips, for appellee.
June 25, 1937:
